name: Spooktober Jam 2021 - Submission
description:
A tiny "puzzle platformer" in which your aim is to reach the end of the level with the most amount of candies possible. Very short.

Environment art from "KayKit Spooktober Seasonal Pack 1" by Kay Lousberg and "NecroPoly Graveyard Halloween" pack by EmaceArt

Ghost character from "Cute Animated Monsters" pack by quaternius

SFX from ZapSplat

Main BGM is a slowed down version without drums of a track from a previous personal project of mine.

Obviously a prototype made with very limited time.
